name: Jump In The Dump
description:
Avoid obstacles to reach the top, fantastic parkour and endless jump, slide under obstacles and rocket jump !

POV : Nobody can win this game in less than 2 minutes 😏

So let's jump in the dump !!

Tips for better performance :

  • Please read every thing in the game (control , Explanation of the tools......)
  • best resolution for the game 1920x1080 (UI)

     

   Music :  https://filmmusic.io/
